items.content_html: Sheetabase is a lightweight package that transforms Google Sheets into a powerful database with easy-to-use ORM-like querying. It offers promise-based functions for creating, reading, updating, and deleting data, making it simple to integrate and use in your projects.
items.title: Ibnuard/sheetabase: Sheetabase is a lightweight package that transforms Google Sheets into a powerful database with easy-to-use ORM-like querying. It offers promise-based functions for creating, reading, updating, and deleting data, making it simple to integrate and use in your projects.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) or on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, IntelNUC, etc.)

items.content_html: A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work seamlessly on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!
items.title: ChristianE00/AudioKit:  A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work seamlessly on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!
